Defined class GenLKM with attribute(s) and method(s). Generate kernel module by template and parameters.

class gen_kernel_module.lkm.GenLKM(verbose=False)[source]

Bases: ats_utilities.config_io.base_check.FileChecking, gen_kernel_module.lkm.config.ProConfig, gen_kernel_module.lkm.config.pro_name.ProName

Defined class GenLKM with attribute(s) and method(s). Generate kernel module by template and parameters. It defines:

attributes
GEN_VERBOSE - console text indicator for process-phase.
PRO_STRUCTURE - template/project structure.
CANCEL - cancel id.
MODULES - modules key.
__reader - reader API.
__writer - writer API.
methods
__init__ - initial constructor.
get_reader - getter for template reader.
get_writer - getter for template writer.
gen_module - generate kernel module.
__str__ - dunder method for GenLKM.
CANCEL = 4
GEN_VERBOSE = 'GEN_KERNEL_MODULE::LKM::GEN_LKM'
MODULES = 'modules'
PRO_STRUCTURE = '/../conf/project.yaml'
VERBOSE = 'ATS_UTILITIES'
choose_module(verbose=False)[source]

Choose type of kernel module.

Parameters

data model, type id {0, 1, 2, 3, 4}.

<dict>, <int>

None
